org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel
Class AeActivityStateImageFilter

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.image.ImageFilter
      java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter
          org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.AeActivityStateImageFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.awt.image.ImageConsumer
class AeActivityStateImageFilter
extends java.awt.image.RGBImageFilter

Image filter class to apply gray scale as well as change the image's alpha level.
